name: Dreamcast Collection
description: Experience four of SEGA’s classic hits from the Dreamcast era in this must-have collection. Speed through uncharted territories in Sonic Adventure ™, zip around town in Crazy Taxi ™, fend off menacing invaders in Space Channel 5 ™ or get your nostalgia fix with SEGA Bass Fishing™! These games are sure to delight old and new gamers of all ages.
